SEARCH
Package gutek.services

Class DeckStatisticsService

java.lang.Object
gutek.services.DeckStatisticsService
@Service public class DeckStatisticsService extends Object
Service class responsible for managing deck statistics.

    • loadDeckStatistics

      public Optional<DeckBaseStatistics> loadDeckStatistics(Long deckStatisticsId)
      Loads the statistics for the specified deck by its ID.
      Parameters:
      deckStatisticsId - The ID of the deck statistics to retrieve.
      Returns:
      An Optional containing the DeckBaseStatistics if found, or an empty Optional if not found.
